Reviews.Title: it sucks
Reviews.Author: brandon kennedy
Reviews.Content: it has started to freeze up and wont hild a charge. but.i have to deal with it cause i have no money to buy another one....

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: smith
Reviews.Content: I love this product. I can now have music and dirty videos on my phone. I uploaded a video of a truck loading dirt onto another truck. It was really messy. I loved it! I felt like Bob the builder after watching this!

Reviews.Title: Am good for my HTC
Reviews.Author: Epifania R.
Reviews.Content: Thank you very much, i like so much my Sprint HTC EVO Design Android 4G Phone I feel happy for this product.Epifania de Paula R

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: veronica Barajas
Reviews.Content: The cell phone does no work properly it turns off once it is disconnected from the charger.very disappointed I am stuck with no phone again.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: markeith
Reviews.Content: i like the phone its better than the other htc phones that i ha i whould tell people to get the phone
